attributes.action: We don't want 5,000 muslims protesting for full sharia law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Islam4uk is extreme and we want to stop them from getting full sharia law in the UK.

Sharia law is dicriminating women and their rights. Floggings, stonings, hands chopping off, 40 lashes and beheadings have no place for any cililzised society.

This must be stopped people will be heard and we will not let muslims intimindate the west.

rejection.details: Sharia has no jurisdiction in England and Wales, and there is no intention for this to change.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
